// - Opens up a menu of the decks available to this
// - Replace 'ruleset' with the name of the ruleset found
// in the plugin parameters. Quotes needed around name.
- Checks to see if a deck has been selected.
- Returns 'true' if there is one. Otherwise 'false'.
// - Replace 'id' with the ID of the opponent. If it is
// - Replace 'actorIDd' with the ID of a database actor
// used to represent this opponent in battle.
// - Replace 'id' with the ID of the opponent. If it is
// - Creates the opponent's deck to be used for battle.
// - Replace 'ruleset' with the name of the used ruleset.
// - Replace 'name' with the name of this deck.

var dict = {}; var list = new Array(); var excep = [103, 113, 118, 123, 124, 125, 126, 127, 128, 141, 154, 168, 169, 170, 171, 172, 173, 174, 175, 176, 177, 178, 179, 180];function GetRandomNum(Min, Max){ var Range = Max - Min; var Rand = Math.random(); return (Min + Math.round(Rand * Range));}

while(list.length < 20){ var num = GetRandomNum(129,192); var index = excep.indexOf(num); if(index < 0){ if(dict.hasOwnProperty(num)){ if(dict[num] < 3){ dict[num] += 1; list.push(num);}}else{ list.push(num); dict[num] = 1}}}

while(list.length < 30){ var num = GetRandomNum(103,192); var index = excep.indexOf(num); if(index < 0){ if(dict.hasOwnProperty(num)){ if(dict[num] < 3){ dict[num] += 1; list.push(num);}}else{ list.push(num); dict[num] = 1}}}
// - Replace 'id' with the ID of the opponent. If it is
// - Sets the cards used in the opponent's deck.
// - Replace 'x' with the database item ID's of the cards.
// - Replace 'id' with the ID of the opponent. If it is
// - Replace 'type' with an A.I. type that can be used
// and referenced to from the Opponent A.I. Common Event.
- Checks if the battle result is a victory.
- Checks if the battle result is a defeat.
